channel.title: [NEW!] I call it... Friend Scripts!
channel.description:
Friend Scripts
Able to be a lot less detectable because this is how it will work.
Let's say someone made this fletcher, and he made it into a Friend Script.
Two friends would take that script, modify the conversation inside, and then run the script at the same time and using a telephone to make sure to time it just right. Then when they run the script, the fletcher will work perfectly, and you will be typing to the friend you want to talk to with the conversation you want Jagex to think you're having.
It's ingenious! :) Makes it a little more complicated, but it will definitely lower chances of getting people banned. ;)
~Ron

item.title: [NEW!] I call it... Friend Scripts!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

I made one for myself a week ago. Works well while fletching.

I set it up on 2 accounts. My friends and mine. This is so sweet. About 5-20 second wait inbetween typing.

item.title: [NEW!] I call it... Friend Scripts!
item.dc:creator: @Cheesehunk Cheesehunk
item.description:
@Cheesehunk wrote:

[quote=“dark_sniper, post:11, topic:6495”][quote author=Cheesehunk link=topic=8901.msg103555#msg103555 date=1154213799]
SRL already has the capabilities of having an AutoResponder. Only SRL devs, and special members have the working autoresponder.
[/quote]

o am i special cheezy?[/quote]

Did you get it? I’m pretyy sure he Pm’ed it to all SRL Members 2 hours before it closed down.

I have it all set-up. He said its for our eyes only, but if you don’t have it I’m sure your special enough for me to send it to you. And no, I refuse to give it to other SRL Members unless you are special like darky.

Read full topic

item.title: [NEW!] I call it... Friend Scripts!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

*DEAD*:

man 24 hours of convo would take forever. there is a bot called A.L.I.C.E (google it) that does a good job of responding.

Here is my convo with her (a little):

Human: shut up
ALICE: OK I’ll stop talking now.
Human: you better
ALICE: Who is going to make me?
Human: me
ALICE: How are you going to make me?
Human: with my dick
ALICE: Your dick sounds like a plan.

Read full topic
